author: Paul Steinhauser
title: PA Republican Senate candidate McCormick calls Putin 'tyrant' who 'needs to be kept in check'

sentence: Oz is in a crowded GOP race that also includes top rivals such as Dave McCormick, a former hedge fund executive, West Point graduate and Gulf War combat veteran who served as a Treasury Department official in former President George W. Bush's administration; Jeff Bartos, a real estate developer, philanthropist and the 2018 Republican nominee for lieutenant governor; and Carla Sands, a real estate executive and major Republican donor who served as ambassador to Denmark under former President Donald Trump.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Dr. Oz says his celebrity 'a huge advantage' as he runs for Senate; says he's 'aligned' with GOP voters

sentence: "The bigoted attacks my opponent Dave McCormick has made against me as the child of immigrants are reminiscent of slurs made in the past about Catholics and Jews," Oz said.
author: Alex Rogers and Michael Warren
title: Dr. Oz vows to renounce Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate
